title: GenAI Center of Excellence: Idea Task
description: GenAI Center of Excellence Idea Task showing the flow from training through deployment with interactive hover details.

taskStages.name: Training Program
taskStages.description: 1-hour online training program teaches employees to identify high-value AI opportunities, understand feasibility constraints, and calculate ROI for potential projects.

taskStages.name: Idea Submission
taskStages.description: Universal web form allows all employees to submit GenAI ideas with problem statements, proposed solutions, expected benefits, and resource requirements.

taskStages.name: Expert Review
taskStages.description: GenAI expert panel conducts technical feasibility assessment, business value analysis, and provides detailed feedback to submitters and managers within 2 weeks.

taskStages.name: Scoring & Categorization
taskStages.description: Ideas scored on feasibility, risk, and benefits (1-5 scale). Categorized by problem type, complexity level, department, and implementation timeframe.

taskStages.name: Monthly Selection
taskStages.description: Expert panel meets monthly to select 2-5 highest-scoring ideas for development funding based on strategic alignment and available resources.

taskStages.name: Development
taskStages.description: Dedicated development teams build solutions with bi-weekly progress reports, technical support from GenAI CoE, and milestone tracking.

taskStages.name: Deployment
taskStages.description: Successful solutions deployed to production with user training, performance monitoring, and measurement of ROI and business impact.
